duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure infrastructure supports key analyses by identifying logging gaps.
Build or modify new/existing data pipelines for tracking metrics.
Conduct end-to-end analysis including data gathering, processing, analysis, and presentations.
Produce insights and metrics for technical and business stakeholders.
Deliver presentations of findings and recommendations to leadership.
Make business recommendations for stakeholders through visual displays of quantitative information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience (Master's preferred)
